name: ALL OF THE LUCK
description:
Now YOU can wield the power of ancient Gamblignants! Press "R" to get rolling!

Generate ridiculous randomized spell phrases, and see if you have ALL OF THE LUCK to achieve a full 64 roll. WARNING: You may ASCEND to ANCESTRAL GOD POWER.

A silly little thing I made to both test out dice math, as well as the itch.io platform.

Something silly may happen if you do roll a 64... but that's a very, very, very low chance.

Version 1.4
